Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 76th overall pick, by Malibu in 1973...
Had first career hit on 9/17/1980, off Robert Miller (NE)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/26/1981, off Mike Davis (BC)...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 2/6/1986 to a 3-year deal worth $1,069,500 per year...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Ashburn on 10/10/1987...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 2/15/1989 to a 4-year deal worth $930,300 per year...
Injured on 9/9/1989 with a Fractured Ribs, out for 2-3 weeks...
